# reshape training data
train_x = train_x.reshape((train_x.shape[0], train_x.shape[1], 1))
Listing 14.28: Example of reshaping input data for the CNN model.
The model fit() function for ﬁtting the CNN model on the training dataset is listed below.
The model takes the following ﬁve conﬁguration parameters as a list:
 n input: The number of lag observations to use as input to the model.
 n filters: The number of parallel ﬁlters.
